meanings.definition: A character or symbol written or printed below the line.
meanings.sent1: The subscript in the equation denoted the value below the line.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include the subscript when writing chemical formulas.
meanings.sent3: The little subscript character was feeling down below the line.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a subscript, always present but often overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The subscript, like a hidden treasure, held the key to the answer below the line.

meanings.definition: A number or symbol written or printed below and to the right of another number or symbol.
meanings.sent1: The subscript indicated the footnote at the bottom of the page.
meanings.sent2: In mathematics, the subscript is used to represent indices.
meanings.sent3: The little subscript number was always following the bigger number around.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a subscript, adding a touch of brightness to his day.
meanings.sent5: The subscript, like a loyal companion, faithfully stayed below and to the right of its partner.
